short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to easily find and connect with influencers on TikTok

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Important: This is a legacy Chrome extension. A new and improved version of Letz DM is available now. Instead of installing this extension, head over to https://app.letzdm.com and signup there.

Say goodbye to manual searches and agency fees. Find TikTok influencers on auto-pilot for your brand within seconds. Use hashtags or keywords, set your filters, and let us do the heavy lifting to find influencers at scale. Automate your TikTok influencer marketing, focus on creating amazing collaborations and build direct connections with influencers.
